text: Hagi ana avanagna zama nege'na, tusi koro nehu'na nahirahiku hu'noe. Ana nehugeno a'nemo'za mofavre anteku nehazageno, zamarimpa zamata negriankna huno natagri'ne. Nagra ana zankura tusi koro nehugeno, antahintahinimo'a knarera osu'ne. Ana hige'na mago'zama kezanku'ene mago kema antahi zankura nave'osige'na pri hu'noe.
